name: Pocket Piano Two [Android]
description:
This game app is for your Android device- tablet or phone. This product is completely different than Pocket Piano One, the sounds are different and modes are different. Different shape of wave makes different sound (physics).

-Multi Touch Piano.

-Three different sound modes (tones)

-Full keyboard.

-Professional Sounds

-No Ads or Micro Transactions.

- Android .apk file.
